attribute_information.Affiliations: The institutional affiliations of the authors, such as departments or research centers
attribute_information.Authors: A list of the individuals who contributed to or authored the dataset
attribute_information.Citation: Formal citation information for referencing the dataset in publications
attribute_information.CollegeName: The college or broader organizational unit associated with the dataset
attribute_information.DOI: The persistent identifier (Digital Object Identifier) that uniquely identifies the dataset
attribute_information.DataLicense: Licensing information that defines how the dataset can be used or shared
attribute_information.DepartmentName: The specific department, lab, or research center responsible for the dataset
attribute_information.FileList: Names of files included in the dataset, such as .tab, .csv, or .txt files
attribute_information.Funder: Organizations or institutions that funded the research or data collection
attribute_information.Keywords: Terms associated with the dataset for easier search and thematic classification
attribute_information.Objectives: A brief description of the research goals or purpose of the dataset
attribute_information.PeriodCovered: The time frame during which data was collected (e.g., growing seasons, study period)
attribute_information.PublicationDate: The date the dataset was made publicly available
attribute_information.StudyLocation: Geographic location where the study or data collection took place
attribute_information.Title: The title of the dataset or study as published in Borealis

meta.description: The research_data.csv dataset is a core component of the RED-X app and serves as the primary cache of research metadata retrieved from the Borealis Dataverse repository. It contains structured metadata for multiple agricultural and environmental studies, including fields such as Title, PublicationDate, Authors, Affiliations, Keywords, and Objectives. Each record is linked to a persistent identifier (DOI), along with institutional context like CollegeName and DepartmentName. These entries support the appâ€™s dynamic search, visualization, and filtering features, and are stored in a local SQLite database to improve performance and reduce redundant API calls.
meta.name: Research_data
